org.apache.flink.configuration

类 HeartbeatManagerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.configuration.HeartbeatManagerOptions

  • @PublicEvolving
public class HeartbeatManagerOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    The set of configuration options relating to heartbeat manager settings.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL
      Time interval for requesting heartbeat from sender side
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> HEARTBEAT_TIMEOUT
      Timeout for requesting and receiving heartbeat for both sender and receiver sides

    • 构造器概要
